alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Kalamazoo; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 7:52AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Van Buren, Allegan and Kalamazoo Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 752 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles northwest of South Haven to near Dowagiac. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hartford and Van Buren SP around 755 AM EDT. South Haven around 800 AM EDT. Bangor around 805 AM EDT. Decatur around 810 AM EDT. Paw Paw around 820 AM EDT. Lawton and Saugatuck around 825 AM EDT. Mattawan and Fennville around 830 AM EDT. Holland around 840 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Fulton, Bradley, Castle Park, Dorr, Hopkins, Plainwell Municipal Airport, Oshtemo, Glendale, Breedsville, and Saugatuck Dunes SP. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
